title: Maxwell's Workshop
data:
***Version [0.29](/0.29 "0.29")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Maxwell%27s_Workshop\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

**Maxwell's Workshop** is a [wizlab](/Wizlab "Wizlab").

## Contents

- [1 Summary](#Summary)
- [2 Monsters](#Monsters)
- [3 Map](#Map)
- [4 History](#History)

## Summary

Maxwell's Workshop is filled with constructs and big workers, from the [fire giants](/Fire_giant "Fire giant") and [frost giants](/Frost_giant "Frost giant") to [angels](/Angel "Angel"). Most of the non-constructs here wield [branded](/Brand "Brand") [great maces](/Great_mace "Great mace").

Many of the random artefacts have "dangerous" properties, like [rampaging](/Rampaging "Rampaging"), [ponderousness](/Ponderousness "Ponderousness"), and rings of [fire](/Ring_of_fire "Ring of fire") and [ice](/Ring_of_ice "Ring of ice"). There is also a chance for both of Maxwell's inventions - [Maxwell's patent armour](/Maxwell%27s_patent_armour "Maxwell's patent armour") and [Maxwell's thermic engine](/Maxwell%27s_thermic_engine "Maxwell's thermic engine") - to generate here.

## Monsters

| E [![Earth elemental.png](/images/a/a6/Earth_elemental.png)](/File:Earth_elemental.png) **[Earth elemental](/Earth_elemental "Earth elemental")** | E [![Fire elemental.png](/images/6/6d/Fire_elemental.png)](/File:Fire_elemental.png) **[Fire elemental](/Fire_elemental "Fire elemental")**             | N [![Salamander.png](/images/5/53/Salamander.png)](/File:Salamander.png) **[Salamander](/Salamander "Salamander")**                               | N [![Salamander tyrant.png](/images/8/8c/Salamander_tyrant.png)](/File:Salamander_tyrant.png) **[Salamander tyrant](/Salamander_tyrant "Salamander tyrant")**                         |
| C [![Fire giant.png](/images/1/16/Fire_giant.png)](/File:Fire_giant.png) **[Fire giant](/Fire_giant "Fire giant")**                               | C [![Frost giant.png](/images/7/74/Frost_giant.png)](/File:Frost_giant.png) **[Frost giant](/Frost_giant "Frost giant")**                               | C [![Ettin.png](/images/c/c6/Ettin.png)](/File:Ettin.png) **[Ettin](/Ettin "Ettin")**                                                             | O [![Ironbound thunderhulk.png](/images/5/50/Ironbound_thunderhulk.png)](/File:Ironbound_thunderhulk.png) **[Ironbound thunderhulk](/Ironbound_thunderhulk "Ironbound thunderhulk")** |
| A [![Angel.png](/images/8/83/Angel.png)](/File:Angel.png) **[Angel](/Angel "Angel")**                                                             | 9 [![Crystal guardian.png](/images/6/60/Crystal_guardian.png)](/File:Crystal_guardian.png) **[Crystal guardian](/Crystal_guardian "Crystal guardian")** | 8 [![Lightning spire.png](/images/5/5f/Lightning_spire.png)](/File:Lightning_spire.png) **[Lightning spire](/Lightning_spire "Lightning spire")** | 9 [![Electric golem.png](/images/f/f9/Electric_golem.png)](/File:Electric_golem.png) **[Electric golem](/Electric_golem "Electric golem")**                                           |

A single [electric golem](/Electric_golem "Electric golem") waits at the end of the wizlab, at the topmost room.

## History

Maxwell's Workshop was introduced in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
html:
Maxwell's Workshop

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.29: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.

Maxwell's Workshop is a wizlab.

Contents

  • 1 Summary
  • 2 Monsters
  • 3 Map
  • 4 History

Summary

Maxwell's Workshop is filled with constructs and big workers, from the fire giants and frost giants to angels. Most of the non-constructs here wield branded great maces.

Many of the random artefacts have "dangerous" properties, like rampaging, ponderousness, and rings of fire and ice. There is also a chance for both of Maxwell's inventions - Maxwell's patent armour and Maxwell's thermic engine - to generate here.

Monsters

9 Peacekeeper 9 Gargoyle (monster) 9 War gargoyle 9 Molten gargoyle
E Earth elemental E Fire elemental N Salamander N Salamander tyrant
C Fire giant C Frost giant C Ettin O Ironbound thunderhulk
A Angel 9 Crystal guardian 8 Lightning spire 9 Electric golem

A single electric golem waits at the end of the wizlab, at the topmost room.

Most of the non-constructs here wield [[brand]]ed [[great mace]]s. Many of the random artefacts have "dangerous" properties, like [[rampaging]], [[ponderousness]], and rings of [[ring of fire|fire]] and [[ring of ice|ice]].
